member.name: M:atcGraph.clsGraphFrequency.IsIn(System.Double,System.Double[])
member.summary: Return True if aArray is Nothing or else it contains a number within 1e-30 of aNumber

member.name: F:atcGraph.clsGraphProbability.pNonExceedance
member.summary: True for Non-Exceedance graph False for Exceedance graph Default is Exceedance
member.remarks: Because New runs before setting private member, must set nonExceedance to false to default to exceedance graph

member.name: M:atcGraph.frmGraphEditor.Edit(ZedGraph.ZedGraphControl)
member.summary: Show this form for customizing the specified ZedGraphControl

member.name: M:atcGraph.frmGraphEditor.UserEditFontSpec(ZedGraph.FontSpec@)

member.returns: True if font was edited, false if user cancelled

member.name: M:atcGraph.modGraph.FindYAxis(atcData.atcTimeseries,ZedGraph.ZedGraphControl,atcData.atcTimeseriesGroup)
member.summary: Find a Y axis (LEFT, RIGHT, or AUX) for the given atcTimeseries
member.param: Timeseries data to turn into a curve
ZedGraphControl to add the curve to
Group of other data on this graph, a hint for which Y axis to use

member.name: M:atcGraph.modGraph.AddTimeseriesCurves(atcData.atcTimeseriesGroup,ZedGraph.ZedGraphControl)

member.param: Group of timeseries to make into curves
graph control to add curves to

member.name: M:atcGraph.modGraph.MakeCommonStartYear(atcData.atcTimeseriesGroup,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return a new group of TS with dates shifted if needed for all TS to start in aStartYear
member.param: Data to shift as needed to start in aStartYear
Year that resulting data will be shifted to start in, or zero to start in same year as first TS in aTimeseriesGroup

member.name: M:atcGraph.modGraph.MakeCommonStartDay(atcData.atcTimeseriesGroup,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return a new group of TS with dates shifted if needed for all TS to start on the same day
member.param: Year that resulting data will be shifted to start in, or zero to start in same year as first TS in aTimeseriesGroup
Month that resulting data will be shifted to start in, or zero to start in same month as first TS in aTimeseriesGroup
Day of month that resulting data will be shifted to start in, or zero to start in same day as first TS in aTimeseriesGroup

member.name: M:atcGraph.modGraph.Scalit(System.Double,System.Double,System.Boolean,System.Double@,System.Double@)
member.summary: Determines an appropriate scale based on the minimum and maximum values and whether an arithmetic or logarithmic scale is requested. For log scales, the minimum and maximum must not be transformed.
